p: The materials were commonly criticized for having an unclear purpose or “muddled message.” In four groups, participants were confused about the purpose of the materials, whether it was to motivate people to act on climate change or to adopt preventative behaviours in response to the increasing health risks from blacklegged ticks. As one participant articulated: “What’s the purpose?… Are you trying to activate people on a climate change question, or are you trying to activate them to take better care of themselves health-wise?”
